title: How to find happiness in a bad financial situation - Life & Lessons - Quora

response.answer_text: You need to always be focusing on solving the problem. Each day do at least one task that takes you nearer to working it out. It's only by actually dealing with problems/always working towards a solution that you can have peace of mind.
make your own financial plan specifically then start making small online business which starts with $0. Stay tune then you will have some small incomes. Wish you all the best :-)
